about_the_game:
You play as an adventurer who descended into the dungeon in search of profit. But it's not that simple. The dungeon is full of dangerous slugs! Either you are them, or they are you! Dodge these deadly little monsters. But don't forget about the attack either – kill them all. The further into the dungeon, the more slugs there are.
Lamp pixel graphics and a pleasant unobtrusive color palette of the game allows you to fully focus on the goal of the game. And intuitive gameplay and simple controls allow you to immediately plunge into the game without much foreplay and learning the rules.
Kill enemies to advance through the levels and earn coins. Coins can be spent to buy upgrades. Become faster, stronger, more resilient and collect more coins.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
